verbose_text: However, in some desiccation-tolerant invertebrates, such as bdelloid rotifers and some tardigrades, disaccharide accumulation is not detectable, but it has also been shown that TRE genes were highly expressed compared to TPS genes in bdelloid rotifer Adineta vaga, explaining why trehalose had not been detected in previous studies of bdelloids during desiccation.
